About Louis Original Drive in Restaurant Louis Original Drive in Restaurant is a Fast Food restaurant located at 4624 N Broadway St in Knoxville, TN . Louis Original Drive in Restaurant has been described as an Perfect Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 10 by our members. Quick Facts
Cuisine: Fast Food, Pizza, American Accepts Credit Card: Yes Parking: N/A
Atmosphere: N/A Take Reservations: Yes Serves Alcohol: N/A Smoking Allowed: No
User Reviews for Louis Original Drive in Restaurant
All Reviews for Louis Original Drive in Restaurant
Lauren
September 02, 2008
Food
10
Decor
10
Service
10
Louis restaurant has been around for a long time and has many fans. Expect the parking lot to be packed during dinner time or on the weekends. If you are looking for the best comfort food in Knoxville, try Louis spaghetti. The sauce is so good. They load up the plates too so you get a lot of food. The prices are good for as much food as you get.
Overall Rating
10
"Perfect"
Anonymous
March 27, 2009
Food
10
Decor
10
Service
10
Someone had recommended that I try Beijing II. The first time I tried to go there, they were closed. I believe they close at 8PM or even before on weeknights. This place is extremely small. One of the small tables is next to the order window, so anyone coming in to pick up a to-go order will be right on top of your food. Don't let them seat you there! The place is really TOO small for the tables they have there.The menu is moderately varied although not as much as I have seen elsewhere. The pric
Overall Rating
10
"Perfect"
